text: Hey guys, it's Ro, I wanted to make an announcement video because we have some exciting things going on
and I wanted to fill you in.
First announcement: my baking line with Wilton is officially out!
It just came out yesterday; it is now available online and in store.
You can find it online at Amazon, Jo-Ann, Michaels and Walmart
and then in-store at Jo-ann and Michaels.
Also, you can always go to RosannaPansino.com/BakingLine
I'll put a link down below to find out where the line is available
because it may be available in more places in the near future.
Second announcement: in celebration of the line coming out I've just found out, I got the green light;
we're going on a baking line tour!
I'm so excited because this will be my second tour. My first tour was for the Nerdy Nummies cookbook
and it was amazing. I got to meet so many of you guys and see the country.
Many of you know I don't travel a lot, I'm always at home baking in my kitchen
and it's just really special getting to meet you guys face-to-face so I can't believe I get to do it again.
Ro: Do you guys want to take a selfie?
Audience: YEAAAAAH!
We're going to be doing some meetups in California, New York,
and a bunch of stops all the way down to Texas.
The tour schedule with all of the dates and store locations will be on
RosannaPansino.com/Tour
And the bus is back. That's right, I'm going to be on a big rock star tour bus.
Just like before we're going to have a new wrap and design on it. If you see the bus please take a picture
and send it to me. Use the hashtag #RoBakingLineTour so I can find it.
Let's talk about the deets. Because the meetups are in retail stores, the amount of spots are limited.
Rules for the meetup are very simple; the first 300 people to come to the store day of
and get something from the baking line will get a ticket to the meetup.
I would highly suggest coming early to the stores day of because those spots are limited.
Third and final announcement, what better way to celebrate the new baking line than to do a giveaway?
I'm going to be giving out three different goodie boxes for three different winners
filled with a bunch of different items from my baking line like:
sprinkles, cookie cutters, molds, a whole bunch of cool stuff.
If you are interested in entering the giveaway go to
Wilton.com/RosannaPansino and there will be a little form.
The form will ask what is your favorite Nerdy Nummies treat and you can put anything.
You could put unicorn poo cookies, or a motherboard cake.
Then it will ask for your name, date of birth and email.
It asks for date of birth because you have to be 13 years or older to win,
so if you're under 13 go talk to your parents.
Alright that is it for the announcement video.
My baking line is out, I'm going on tour, and doing a giveaway.
I can't believe the tour starts in ten days, it's a week and a half.
I got to get packing.
And, just a reminder, for info on where to find the baking line and the tour schedule
It's on RosannaPansino.com/BakingLine and RosannaPansino.com/Tour.
I hope to see your faces on tour, I am so excited
Muah, okay, bye-bye.
